extension.description:
WhatsApp Share for Joomla

WhatsApp Share for Joomla is a lightweighted plugin, it enables a WhatsApp sharing button in your website when a visitor is using a Mobile Device.

Now your users can share your website pages through WhatsApp service to all of their mobile contacts.

For installation: Enable this plugin in Plugin Manager > Type Content
